inclusion.criterion: Patients ≥ 18 years of age with NYHA II-IV CHF of at least six months duration who
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: have been implanted with a device capable of serial intrathoracic impedance measurement (Optivol®)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients implanted with an Optivol ®device will be eligible for enrollment six months following implantation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential may be included if they have a negative urine pregnancy test at the time of enrollment and agree to use effective contraception throughout the study and for 1 month following their participation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or lactating
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability or unwillingness to maintain adequate contraception(women of childbearing potential) for the duration of the study and for 1 month following their participation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
